00010 class CMHeader implements CMClass {
00011  
00017  public static function Version() {
00018   return "1.0";
00019  }
00020  
00026  public static function Since() {
00027   return "1.0";
00028  }
00029  
00050  public static function Location($url, $values = array()) {
00051   // substitute values
00052   if(is_array($values)) {
00053    $parts = explode('^', $url);
00054    $new_url = "";
00055    for($i = 0; $i < count($parts) - 1; ++$i) {
00056     // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00057     if($values[$i] instanceof CMConstant)
00058      $new_url .= $parts[$i] . $values[$i];
00059     else $new_url .= $parts[$i] . "'" . urlencode($values[$i]) . "'";
00060    }
00061    $url = $new_url . $parts[count($parts) - 1];
00062   } elseif($values !== false) {
00063    // if its a CMConstant we don't encapsulate it
00064    if($values instanceof CMConstant)
00065     $url = str_replace('?', $values, $url);
00066    else $url = str_replace('?', "'" . urlencode($values) . "'", $url);
00067   }
00068   
00069   // change header to notify the browser to redirect
00070   header("Location: $url");
00071   exit(0);
00072  }
00073  
00081  public static function SaveAsFile($name, $type = "text/plain") {
00082   header("Content-type: $type");
00083   header("Content-Disposition: attachment; filename=\"$name\"");
00084   return true;
00085  }
00086  
00090  public function __toString() {
00091   return "<" . get_class($this) . ">";
00092  }
00093  
00094 }
